formatted_address: 470 N Bridge Rd, #04-07 Bugis Cube, Singapore 188735
name: Party World KTV (Bugis Cube)

reviews.text:
Nicole (staff at counter) was super super helpful and welcoming to my group of friends. She helped us get chairs to sit outside while waiting for our turn and ensured that we were comfortable also.

Service when we had the room was also superb. Chips were a little stale but other than that, we are definitely coming back again!

We went on a Friday afternoon and the section we were at had nobody else for the entire two hours so it felt a little empty. Unexpectedly, the staff offered to take our payment afterward instead of upfront, however barged in 30 minutes BEFORE the ending time to demand for payment (???). It was quite puzzling of them to interrupt to get the payment before we had finished the session.

The service charge and GST were additional fees and as all drinks were served together, the cold one melted while the hot one became cold. 3/10 experience
Friendly and helpful staffs. But sound system has  issues. Vibration occurs when + or - tone. Also cant control mic volume
There is a massage chair in the room, a shaker, mic stand and the pricing is affordable.
First time to this place, value for money, nice and clean place, staffs are very friendly  , good sound system., my family member enjoy very much. Will come back again.üëç
